titles.title: Animal Feed Protection Act of 1987
A bill to prohibit the use of subtherapeutic doses of penicillin, chlortetracycline, and oxytetracycline in animal feed.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.
Committee on Labor and Human Resources requested executive comment from Health and Human Services Department.

bill.summary: 3/6/1987--Introduced. Animal Feed Protection Act of 1987 - Amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to prohibit the use of subtherapeutic doses of penicillin, chlortetracycline, or oxytetracycline in animal feed.
